title: [Badlands, Ravine]
description: The parched hills rise sharply on either side of the ravine.  The hard, cold ground is free of grass, and the only wild beasts that manage to survive here are small lizards that scamper in and out of the jagged rock formations.

The parched hills rise sharply on either side of the ravine.  The hard, cold ground is free of grass, and the only wild beasts that manage to survive here are small lizards that scamper in and out of the jagged rock formations in an sometimes vain attempt to elude larger nocturnal predators.
